title: Account From LOL Transfer To Garena(Malaysia)

replies.body:
Hey StampOnYou,

Unfortunately, transfer between the Garena and OCE regions is not available, and as far as I'm aware, Riot has not discussed making this feature available in the foreseeable future. For now, if you'd like to play on the Garena servers, you'll have to level up a new account. Sorry; I know that's not the answer you're looking for. If you have any additional questions, don't hesitate to ask.
